ğŸŒ¸ *Ivy Geranium (Balcony)* (Outdoor balcony with full sun to partial shade)
   ğŸ’¡ Thrives in bright, direct sunlight and well-draining soil. Allow the top layer of soil to dry slightly between waterings. Deadhead spent flowers to promote continuous blooming; pinch back leggy stems; protect from frost.
ğŸŒ¿ *Peacock Plant (Indoor)* (Bright, indirect light indoors with high humidity)
   ğŸ’¡ Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged; use filtered or rainwater to prevent leaf tip browning; maintain humidity above 60%; avoid direct sun; dust leaves regularly to promote healthy photosynthesis.
ğŸŒ´ *Dragon Tree (Indoor Corner)* (Bright, indirect light indoors; avoid drafts)
   ğŸ’¡ Use well-draining soil; allow top 2-3 cm of soil to dry between waterings; avoid waterlogged conditions to prevent root rot; maintain moderate humidity; wipe leaves to remove dust; rotate periodically for even growth; feed lightly during active season.
